long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabCorral is useful for managing any number of tabs. This extension is perfect for students and professionals alike and allows for faster and easier browsing by reducing the number of tabs you need open.

The two main features of TabCorral are:

Search tabs: An easy to use search-bar allows you to search both your tabs URL's and titles and then easily navigate to any tab.

Tab groups: Create a tab group with a custom name containing any number of tabs. These groups can be easily opened or closed to reduce the number of tabs you have open. Tabs can be easily grouped be holding crtl or shift and selecting multiple tabs, then clicking "create group" in which these tabs are pre-selected.


Known Bugs:
Cannot add page if duplicates are open.


Upcoming Features:
Support changing to a tab in another window.


Developed by: Sacha Borowski-Davies.
